name: The North Face Thermoball Eco Parka 2 - Women's
description:
A parka for cold days around town. Lined with ThermoBall Eco insulation, it's lightweight and compresses like down, but is made from 100% post consumer recycled polyester. Thoughtful details throughout protect you from the elements  and give you plenty of space to carry gloves, phone and wallet.Colours use a different shell material – solids: 30-denier polyester, heathers: 50-denier recycled polyester, shiny colours: 20-denier polyester.PFC-free DWR sheds light rain.ThermoBall™ Eco recycled polyester insulation, like down, it traps heat in small air pockets to retain warmth and is compressible,  but has the wet-weather warmth of synthetics.Insulated hood is trimmed with elastic to stay in place through gusts.Adjustable waist and elastic trimmed cuffs.Zippered hand pockets for daily necessities, zippered internal pocket for your phone.2-way zipper lets you adjust your temperature without exposing your upper body to the elements.Gathered waist helps seal warmth against your core.Drop-tail hem and parka length for coverage and warmth.Standard fit wears like it should, no surprises.

        Sustainability
